amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Section 8 housing vouchers by $70 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Section 8 housing vouchers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A009) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 178 (Roll no. 267).
